Package com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.beans

Provides extensions to the ISharedDataPlatform to support the sharing of serialized Java objects.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IBeanAction
    Extends the super interface to bind serializable Java objects (i.e.
    IBeanCondition
    Extends the super interface to bind serializable Java objects (i.e.
    IBeanQuery
    Extends the super interface to bind serializable Java objects (i.e.
    IBeanQueryResult
    Extends the super interface to bind serializable Java objects (i.e.
    IBeanStorage
    Extends the super interface to bind serializable Java objects (i.e.
    ISharedBean
    Extends the super interface to bind serializable Java objects to the generic types.
    ISharedBeanDescriptor
    Extends the super interface to bind serializable Java objects.
    ISharedBeanPlatform
    Extends the generic super interface to bind serializable Java objects to the generic types.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBeanExpressionCondition
    An implementation of IBeanConditon using JEXL (Java Expression Language:Apache Commons license)
    AbstractBeanExpressionCondition.Aggregator  
    AbstractBeanQuery  
    BeanExpressionCondition
    Enables JEXL-format expressions over beans.
    BeanQueryResult  
    BeanStorage
    Implements a non-persistent in memory storage of beans.
    NamedBeanQuery
    Enables the query of beans based one 1 or more names.
    SharedBean  
    SharedBeanDescriptor  
    SharedBeanPlatform
    Extends the generic super class to bind serializable Java objects to the generic types.

Package com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.beans Description

Provides extensions to the ISharedDataPlatform to support the sharing of serialized Java objects.
